name: Cosmic Raiders
description:
Cosmic Raider is a compact deck-building game inspired by Slay the Spire and FTL. In the game, players loot ships to acquire new weapon and system cards, which can then be used to upgrade their deck.

Created for GDKO Round 3 with the task of "Create a Boss Fight".

Instructions:

To select a card, left click on it. To deselect, right click on it. 

Every turn, you gain 4 power which can be used to play cards. Any unused power is carried over to the next turn. 

After every battle, you will be given the choice to add or remove up to two cards. 

The game is designed as a roguelike and intended to be played from a new game. However, there is an option to continue, which allows you to keep your current deck, gain full health, and choose/remove cards.
